skills.name: Embalming
skills.description: Passive - Ritual of the initiates fortifies you and your minions.

skills.name: Sacrifices
skills.description: Spell - Summons sacrificial corpses to be of use.

skills.name: Death Ward
skills.description: Passive - Dark masteries increase your defense.

skills.name: Famine
skills.description: Passive - Increases damage and returns life when you hit.

skills.name: Bane
skills.description: Curse - Enemies near target minion are weaker to physical damage.

skills.name: Death Pact
skills.description: Passive - Your Devotion determines your combat strengths.

skills.name: Blood Skeleton
skills.description: Summon - Rise skeleton warriors from the mangled corpses of the dead.

skills.name: Grim Vision
skills.description: Upgrade - Skeletons provide an offensive aura to allies.

skills.name: Violent Immolation
skills.description: Upgrade - Deprived of any hesitation the hawks deal higher damage.

skills.name: Night Hawks
skills.description: Summon - Immolating hawks that seek their preys to deal focused damage.

skills.name: Abyss Knight
skills.description: Summon - Death knights with a ranged void blast.

skills.name: Chaos Nova
skills.description: Upgrade - Knights proc a deadly nova on kill and when killed.

skills.name: Metal Solace
skills.description: Upgrade - The Metal flesh mends itself and the golem regenerate its wounds.

skills.name: Iron Golem
skills.description: Special Summon - Consume an item to forge a powerful living servant.

skills.name: Resurgence
skills.description: Passive - Your dark army grows stronger.

skills.name: Parasite
skills.description: Attack - Releases a magic scourge that tears between multiple targets.

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: Attack - Channel a fiery shockwave through your weapon.

skills.name: Reaper
skills.description: Upgrade - Deepens the parasite bloodthirst granting more damage and range.

skills.name: Onslaught
skills.description: Upgrade - Reduced cooldown for more killing power.

skills.name: Angel of Death
skills.description: Warp Strike - Leap in the air and plunge to deliver a devastating blow.

skills.name: Blight Descent
skills.description: Upgrade - Gain poison damage to all your attacks after jumping.

skills.name: Deathlord
skills.description: Buff - Embrace the dark title in exchange for an upsurge of power.

skills.name: Demonic Commune
skills.description: Upgrade - Increased movement speed gifted by a profane bond.

skills.name: Ominous Vigor
skills.description: Passive - Heightens your chances to block, your strength and dexterity.

skills.name: Widowmaker
skills.description: Projectile - Unleash a barrage of homing bolts.

skills.name: Catapult Shot
skills.description: Projectile - Blanket the target area with a spread of volatile potions.

skills.name: Deathly Effigy
skills.description: Trap - Conjure a terrifying effigy that fires ring of bolts and shreds nearby corpses.

skills.name: Flameburst Shot
skills.description: Projectile - Blats out a short ranged spread of fire in front of you.

skills.name: Brutal Effigy
skills.description: Upgrade - Your effigy gains an aura that boosts your combat prowess while nearby.

skills.name: Alchemical Preparation
skills.description: Passive - Your alchemy skills allow you yo prepare more numerous and powerful mixtures.

skills.name: Voodoo Practice
skills.description: Passive - Your devoted practice to the dark arts grants you power.

skills.name: Debilitating Concoction
skills.description: Projectile - Lob a mixture of vile liquids that greatly hinders your foes.

skills.name: Life From Death
skills.description: Passive - Insight on the secrets of life and death heighten your endurance.

skills.name: Death Ripple
skills.description: Projectile - Conjure a deathly ghost lance that explodes on impact.

skills.name: Terror
skills.description: Upgrade - Inflicts a deepening terror upon your target.

skills.name: Dream Eater
skills.description: Spell - Target foe is consumed by horror.

skills.name: Occult Path
skills.description: Passive - Across the darkness a new path is revealed.

skills.name: Nightwalker
skills.description: Passive - Gain mastery over the black arts.

skills.name: Relentless
skills.description: Upgrade - Mastery of the profane arts allow you to summon more spirits.

skills.name: Pestilence
skills.description: Spell - Conjure a vile storm of toxic wrath.

skills.name: Gift of Blooc
skills.description: Passive - Sacrifice blood to become that which you control.

skills.name: Torment
skills.description: Melee Spell - Bombard your target with toxic souls of the damned.

skills.name: Fireheart Totem
skills.description: Totem - Casts explosive fireballs at nearby enemies.

skills.name: Stormeye Totem
skills.description: Totem - Casts a crackling discharge of lightning.

skills.name: Frostclaw Totem
skills.description: Totem - Casts an intense burst of cold at nearby enemies.

skills.name: Apprenticeship
skills.description: Passive - The hidden path of totemancy is revealed to you.

skills.name: Dark Gathering
skills.description: Upgrade - Your authority in the dark arts grows jointly with you army.

skills.name: Dirge
skills.description: Upgrade - Totems unleash their spell when killed.

skills.name: Soulbond
skills.description: Passive - When all elemental totems are present a mystic bond empowers them.

skills.name: Soulchain
skills.description: Passive - Sacrifice two elements for greater proficiency in a third.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Talon's Hold
skills.description: Passive - Slows down targets and reanimates them as skeleton warriors.

skills.name: Land of the Dead
skills.description: Buff - Your mastery of the macabre arts rewards you.

skills.name: Rathma's Chosen
skills.description: Special Summon - Evoke Rathma's avatar upon sanctuary, empowering your combat prowess.

skills.name: Veil King
skills.description: Summon - Bind to the mortal plane the might of the supreme skeletal warlod, the Veil King.

skills.name: Jinn
skills.description: Special Summon - Burning demon clad in an aura of infernal power.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
